articles.description: Britain's Got Talent judge Amanda Holden has sparked online fury after appearing on The One Show in an "inappropriate" dress with a plunging neckline.
articles.content:
Amanda Holden has caused online fury after wearing a dress with a plunging neckline, which was deemed "risky", on The One Show.
The 49 year old, whose eight year old daughter Hollie recently claimed Simon Cowell has split from his girlfriend, wore a stunning… [+2463 chars]

articles.title: Harry Potter star Rupert Grint welcomes daughter with Nottingham actress - Nottinghamshire Live
articles.description: He is the first of the three main Harry Potter stars to become a parent
articles.content:
Harry Potter star Rupert Grint has welcomed a daughter with his Nottingham-born actress partner Georgia Groome.
The actor, best known for playing Ron Weasley in the wizarding franchise, shared the news on Thursday evening, May 7.
Mr Grint becomes the first … [+1125 chars]

articles.title: Drake scores the Official UK Chart double with Dark Lane Demo Tapes and Toosie Slide - Official Charts Company
articles.description: It's the third time that Drake's claimed the feat across separate releases in his career.
articles.content:
Congratulations to Drake, who scores the Official Chart double this week as his Dark Lane Demo Tapes mixtape and song Toosie Slide claim Number 1 on the Official Albums and Singles Charts.
The entries earn the Canadian rapper his third UK Number 1 album and … [+3087 chars]

articles.title: Bob Dylan announces upcoming release of his first original album in eight years - Daily Mail
articles.description: Rough and Rowdy Ways will be released on June 19, the singer revealed on Friday morning, as he dropped another song titled False Prophet from the upcoming album.
articles.content:
Bob Dylan has a new album on the way, eight years after his last album of original songs.
Rough and Rowdy Ways will be released on June 19, the singer revealed on Friday morning, as he dropped another song titled False Prophet from the upcoming album.
